data.eml:eml: Five new species of Rhodamnia (Myrtaceae, Myrteae) from New Guinea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Snow, Neil (2012): Five new species of Rhodamnia (Myrtaceae, Myrteae) from New Guinea. PhytoKeys 19: 31-49, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.19.4098, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.19.4098
